Emergency Services


Risk Management and Safety Services



















Home






Office of Emergency Services devotes its unit to the mission of Sonoma State University by ensuring the university is a safe place for students to learn and live, faculty to teach and profess, and staff and administrators to lead by example by collectively providing a safe atmosphere to thrive.
Emergencies can happen at any time. How you respond is related to how well you are prepared. Contact our office at emergency@sonoma.edu if you have any questions. 
Quick Jumps




22-181_emergency_services_website_icons_current_incidents.png




Current Regional Incidents
Want to know what's happening in Sonoma County or near SSU? Review Current Regional Incidents and Resources.



22-181_emergency_services_website_icons_building_marshall_program.png




Building Marshal Program
Many campus employees serve as safety or building marshal. Review our building marshal program and view campus building emergency plans. 



22-181_emergency_services_website_icons_emergency_preparedness.png




Emergency Preparedness
Need to know what to pack in a 'go kit' or how to prepare for an earthquake? View resources and best practices on emergency preparedness. 

  




22-181_emergency_services_website_icons_emergency_guides.png




Emergency Guides
Want a quick guide for what to do in any emergency? Review our checklists to ensure you are prepared. 



22-181_emergency_services_website_icons_emergency_operations_plan.png




Emergency Operations Plan
Want to know how SSU will respond to emergencies? View the extensive Emergency Operations Plan. 



22-181_emergency_services_website_icons_notifications.png




Emergency Communications
Sign up for SSU's emergency notification system to ensure you receive timely notification of any emergency, and read about our Emergency Communications platforms.
